results.title: Wireless Mouse Rechargeable Optical 2.4g Portable Bluetooth
results.description: Wireless Bluetooth Mouse 800 / 1200 / 1600 DPI Ideal to take it wherever you want with your Notebook or for your desktop PC. Plug in the receiver and start using it. Or connect via Bluetooth. You have both options. Light, comfortable and precise with adjustable DPI in three ranges (800/1200/1600 DPI) rechargeable. 500mAH lithium battery. With a single charge you can use it between 10/15 days 8 hours a day. When you stop using it, it enters Stand By automatically to conserve battery and achieve a longer duration.

results.title: Havit Mechanical Keyboard, Wired Compact PC Keyboard with Number Pad Red Switch Mechanical Gaming Keyboard 89 Keys for Computer/Laptop (Black)
results.description: Compact Keyboard with Numpad Unlike bulky full-sized layout, this 85% keyboard saves more desk space but keep the numkeys which is essential. Press Fn+Backspace to lock/unlock the numkeys (Note: The numpad lights up ONLY when it's unlocked, the rest of the keys don't have lighting). Colorful PBT Keycaps Constructed from unique and high-quality durable PBT keycaps, Havit mechanical keyboard has excellent touch experience and long serving time. Colorful keycaps can bring a more pleasant mood during games or work, decorate your space and enhance your life. Red Switches Keyboard for Different Needs Perfect for office typing or playing games. Havit HV-KB487L wired keyboard frees up your desk during work, after working sessions, you can enjoy the keyboard for gaming, or bring it with you as the size is compact and easy to carry out. Ergonomic Comfort The design of this mechanical gaming keyboard is based on ergonomics, the two keyboard kickstands provide comfortable angle for typing and effectively reduces the burden on the wrist. This 89 key mechanical keyboard is compatible with Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows XP, Windows VISTA and other systems. Cautions: For Mac OS and Chrome OS system, the Num Lock function is not available, so the number pad is unable to be locked and will stay on

results.title: Dell S2722QC Monitor 4K USB-C
results.description: A superior display: High functionality meets excellent style with an ultra-thin three-sided bezel design that lets you see more with less distraction on this 27-inch 4k monitor. Versatile connectivity: Easily charge and connect your laptop on this USB-C monitor. This one-cable solution reduces desktop clutter and carries power, video, audio, and data all at once. A stunning setup: Bring modern elegance to any space with our stunning new platinum silver finish and a subtle textured back that gives your 4K monitor a unique look. Comfort First: Customize your views with a height-adjustable stand that tilts, swivels and pivots allowing you to view in your most optimal position. Built-in speakers: This usb-c monitor comes equipped with everything you need, including dual 3W built-in speakers.

results.title: Smart Tech WS5167 ergonomic black desk chair with mesh and synthetic leather upholstery
results.description: The selection of a suitable chair is very important to prevent future injuries. With this Smart Tech chair, you will have the comfort and well-being you need throughout your day. In addition, you can place it anywhere in your home or office since its design adapts to multiple environments. Give your spaces a more modern touch! It is very common for you to adopt a bad posture when sitting and that undoubtedly brings a series of pathologies that have a direct impact on your well-being. This ergonomic chair is the one for those who spend a lot of time at the desk, whether for work or study, since its design adapts to the shape of the body and guarantees balanced pressure distribution. Create a healthy and productive work environment. With its height adjustment, you will be able to fix the position of your torso with respect to the work table and thus you will get a more comfortable chair at the level of your needs. The armrests will favor your posture when writing and will help you get up more easily when you want to get up. The wheels will allow you to easily move and clean your space. You will be able to move it without difficulty when you need it. In addition, being swivel will allow you to rotate the seat 360º without the need to change position or move from the place where you are.
